sentences: Ferhan Nil Karaibrahimgil (born 17 October 1976) is a Turkish singer and songwriter, mostly noted for her distinct lyrics.
In 2000, Karaibrahimgil graduated from Boğaziçi University with a degree in political science and international relations.
Her articles have been published weekly in Hürriyet, a daily Turkish newspaper, since 2004.
On 21 January 2010, she married Sertab Erener's brother Serdar Erener near the shore of the Nile River.
She has a son named Aziz Arif, born in May 2014.
